testsuite.name: To validate login using valid credentials

testcase.classname: To validate login using valid credentials

testcase.name: user click button using xpath "//input[@name='login']"

testcase.name: user validate title to be "Adactin.com - Search Hotel"
testcase.classname: To validate login using valid credentials
